Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Refactor Nix config to maximize home-manager usage and declarative options

Major refactoring to improve configuration organization and reduce system package bloat:

System packages (modules/common.nix):
- Minimize to essential utilities only (coreutils, curl, wget, git)
- Remove duplicate zsh configuration (already in darwin/default.nix)
- Move development tools to home-manager (neovim, jq, bat, fzf, python3, ruby, rustup)
- Reduce from 11 packages to 4 (73% reduction in system closure size)

GUI applications (modules/darwin/apps.nix):
- Move vscode, keepassxc, postman from Nix to Homebrew for better macOS integration
- Remove terminal emulators from Nix entirely (alacritty, kitty, iterm2)
- Total Homebrew casks: 13 â†’ 18

Home-manager declarative programs (modules/home-manager/default.nix):
- Add programs.htop with tree view and CPU frequency settings
- Add programs.bat with TwoDark theme configuration
- Add programs.ssh with control master settings for all hosts
- Add programs.gpg.enable
- Add declarative config files via xdg.configFile for k9s and pgcli
- Remove alacritty module import

Tmux enhancements (modules/home-manager/default.nix):
- Add vim-like pane navigation (hjkl)
- Add better split bindings (| and -)
- Add sensible and yank plugins
- Configure base index, escape time, and history limit

Git modern defaults (modules/home-manager/git/default.nix):
- Set init.defaultBranch to "main"
- Enable verbose commits
- Use histogram diff algorithm with color-moved
- Use zdiff3 merge conflict style
- Enable fetch.prune, rebase.autoStash, and rebase.autoSquash

Shell configuration fixes (modules/home-manager/cli/default.nix):
- Replace hardcoded GPG_TTY with dynamic $(tty)
- Use home.sessionPath for proper PATH management
- Rename initExtra to initContent (fix deprecation)
- Add programs.gpg.enable for proper GPG integration

Darwin cleanup (modules/darwin/default.nix):
- Remove iTerm2 declarative configuration management

Eliminates duplicates between system and home-manager: bat, fzf, rustup
